Sentencas: In order to improve the performance and stability of anodes for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) under low hydrogen concentration conditions, SrZr0.95Y0.05O3-alpha (SZY) proton conductor particles were incorporated into the conventional Ni/YSZ anode.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of a SOFC with a Ni/YSZ anode incorporating a SrZr0.95Y0.05O3-α proton conductor

Sentencas: Power generation experiments were conducted using the electrolyte-supported single cells with conventional Ni/YSZ and Ni/YSZ-5%SZY anodes.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of a SOFC with a Ni/YSZ anode incorporating a SrZr0.95Y0.05O3-α proton conductor

Sentencas: Enhanced output power density under low hydrogen partial pressure conditions was achieved with the modified anode.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of a SOFC with a Ni/YSZ anode incorporating a SrZr0.95Y0.05O3-α proton conductor

Sentencas: This enhancement is ascribed to a decline in the anode overpotential of the Ni/YSZ-5%SZY anode, estimated from impedance spectra, compared to that of the conventional Ni/YSZ anode.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of a SOFC with a Ni/YSZ anode incorporating a SrZr0.95Y0.05O3-α proton conductor

Sentencas: In addition, the amount of hydrogen adsorption on Ni, YSZ, and SZY was measured using thermal desorption spectroscopy (TDS).
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of a SOFC with a Ni/YSZ anode incorporating a SrZr0.95Y0.05O3-α proton conductor

Sentencas: This revealed that the proton conductor SZY could adsorb a large amount of hydrogen compared with YSZ.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of a SOFC with a Ni/YSZ anode incorporating a SrZr0.95Y0.05O3-α proton conductor

Sentencas: Consequently, the SZY proton conductor may play an important role in the supply/storage of adsorbed hydrogen, or in increasing the oxidation resistance of Ni under low hydrogen concentration conditions.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of a SOFC with a Ni/YSZ anode incorporating a SrZr0.95Y0.05O3-α proton conductor
